reviews.review: Prime alırsanız iyi fazla hile yok

I've played the game for more than five years and have over three thousand hours of game play, though the game focuses more on turning a profit instead of focusing on what the players want. The AI in the game is either bad or insanely hard at times causing practice for the game to be flawed. Until the resent updates players at a certain level would be able to face-off against their same skill ranks, though that has now changed and many of your opponents will be higher ranked than you or hacking. The ranks in competitive will also be reset if you don't play the game for a week. The only two things in my opinion is the best about CSGO is that it gives you drops that you can then sell on the steam market and that the workshop maps created by other players use better AI than the game its self.
